meanings.sent1: The artist painted an ochred sunset on the canvas.
meanings.sent2: The old house had ochred walls that glowed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The ochred cat looked like it had rolled in a pile of paint.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was ochred with the warmth of the setting sun.
meanings.sent5: The ochred leaves rustled in the gentle breeze.

meanings.sent1: The ochred dress she wore matched the autumn leaves perfectly.
meanings.sent2: The ochred sand dunes stretched as far as the eye could see.
meanings.sent3: His ochred shoes made him look like a walking tree stump.
meanings.sent4: The ochred fields whispered of harvest time approaching.
meanings.sent5: The ochred feathers of the bird blended seamlessly with the forest floor.
